price: 79.Tokkel cane keenil gacisneeh ken bayisneh, ken dabooqa (Nabii Luut kee Nabii Shuqeybi marih dabooqa kinnuk) baxxaqqa iyya gitay sinam safarah как gactal tanik usun elle makaskassoowaanaa?

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
